text: But Elisha was sitting in his house, and the elders were sitting with him; and <FI>the king<Fi> sent a man from before him: but ere the messenger came to him, he said to the elders, See ye how this son of a murderer hath sent to take away my head? look, when the messenger cometh, shut the door, and hold the door fast against him: is not the sound of his master’s feet behind him?
name: II Kings 6:32
